summary: This mod will make puddles (and small raindrops fall off the rooves) while it\'s raining, puddles will grow (until a certain limit) as it rains, once it stops raining they will become smaller until they dissapear.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Introduction[/b][/size]
This mod will make puddles around cities in some spots (where I believe they would fit) while it\'s raining, as it rains those puddles will grow until they reach a certain limit then they will stay until it stops raining, then they\'ll get smaller until they dissapear.

This mod also makes small raindrops fall off the rooves, not very noticeable while it rains but overall it gives a nice effect when using Rain clipping mods such as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31629] Real Shelter by Robinsage [/url].

Those puddles will also react to forces, such as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32288] Earthquakes by mannygt [/url] or jumping as normal water would, as well as raindrops falling on it making some splashes.

[size=4][b]Mod Status[/b][/size]
Whiterun (60%)  =>  16 Puddles, 3 buildings with \"wet\" roof
Solitude   (5%)   =>  1 Puddle

[size=4][b]Notes on compatibility[/b][/size]
Is this mod compatible with Frostfall, climates of tamriel, mighty dragons, pokemons, pr0n, ... ? YES. Anything but mods that completly change the look/cell of the cities are compatible.

[size=4][b]Special thanks[/b][/size] [list]
[*]Brodual
[/list]

[youtube]gXSVcuirmpk[/youtube]
author: Xilante

files.name: It Rained On - Loose Files version
files.fileName: It Rained On - Loose Files version-33886-0-10a.rar

files.name: It Rained On - BSA version
files.changelogHtml:
Added more puddles on Whiterun.
Added water-splashes on Whiterun's puddles.
Fixed some bugs.

files.name: It Rained On - Loose Files version

files.changelogHtml:
Added more puddles on Whiterun.
Added water-splashes on Whiterun's puddles.
Fixed some bugs.

files.name: It Rained On - BSA version
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a bug in which some puddles would popup/popout instead of growing/drying (because I tried to manage two things at once in just a function).
Fixed a bug in which some puddles would not dry (because of a typo in the script).
Added more puddles and a wet roof in Whiterun.

Fixed a bug in which some puddles would popup/popout instead of growing/drying (because I tried to manage two things at once in just a function).
Fixed a bug in which some puddles would not dry (because of a typo in the script).
Added more puddles and a wet roof in Whiterun.
